version_description:
This update comes with some nice and cool improvements.

Auto adjustment of text height as you type along, enabling smooth editing of notes.

Nice swipe gestures for managing list notes, continuous left swipe and right swipe, for list item, co

Improved notification badges on the Folders, now provide users with a split view of total lists, and lists that are due or on High Priority.

Fixed sync issues.

Added support for more languages:
German, Spanish, French, Italian, Korean, R

More performance improvements.
A premium feature is now available where you can avail multi-colored dark themes that can be viewed during Low-Light or at night. You can set it to automatic mode, whenever there is less light outside, the theme colors ch

* Better looking App Icon
* Local notifications
* Badge count
* Better usability on list priority settings.
* Completed list moves to Archive immediately.
* New backgrounds
